description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5mbi1","text":"Isolation of nuclei from fresh-frozen brain tissue from sets of multiple (typically 2-20) human donors for analysis as a “cell village” (Wells et al., PMID 36796362) in which nuclei from all donors are analyzed together. Adapted from dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.2srged6 and dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bq64mzgw","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":234,"length":40},{"key":1,"offset":279,"length":41}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"04261C1A685E11EEB94F0A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.2srged6"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"04261C1A685E11EEB94F0A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bq64mzgw"}}}}
keywords: fresh-frozen nuclei,nuclei extraction,snRNAseq,RNAseq,human tissue,brain tissue,multiple donors

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fho39","text":"Gather Supplies","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uo4l","text":"Razor Blades","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epjsu","text":"Glass slides","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15eqg","text":"Syringes with needles (3 mL syringe with 26 1⁄2 gauge needle)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7cie","text":"Myelin removal beads (cat # 130-096-731) https://www.miltenyibiotec.com/US-en/products/myelin-removal-beads-ii-human-mouse-rat.html#gref ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":41,"length":95}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":95}],"data":{}},{"key":"6qr7n","text":"Eppendorf tubes (1.5 mL and 5 mL)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vb2j","text":"Eppendorf or Rainin pipette tips","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90f3n","text":"Dry ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eaon8","text":"20 µM filter","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e85l2","text":"6 well tissue culture plate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6l1jo","text":"Magnetic Bead Separation Rack for 1.5 mL tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqc6e","text":"RNAse free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o3qp","text":"PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bgadf","text":"BSA","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44v6f","text":"Lucigen RNAse inhibitor (i)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9E5A0B74614111EEA03E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.miltenyibiotec.com/US-en/products/myelin-removal-beads-ii-human-mouse-rat.html#gref"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dsp58","text":"Prep","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5g0ij","text":"Turn on and chill 1.5 mL and 50 mL centrifuges with swinging buckets to 4℃ ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajtpq","text":"Prepare all the reagents needed on ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcmlc","text":"Clean glass slides with ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ec4e","text":"Pre-chill glass slides, razors, and syringes with needles","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f0uf9","text":"Solutions to make fresh before starting experiment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8okrd","text":"DB + 5% Kollidon 64  + 0.2 U/uL Lucigen RNAse Inhibitor (5 uL/mL)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k3bh","text":"Filtering and spinning down buffer: DB + 0.016 U/uL Lucigen RNAse inhibitor (5-12.5 uL/12.5 mLs)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0lkr","text":"     (In earlier experiments 12.5 uL of inhibitor were used, but this was later scaled down to 5 uL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":100}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2je5","text":"10X cell loading buffer: 1% BSA + 0.2 U/uL of i","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"32kjh","text":"Section and mince tissue using a pre-chilled razor and glass slide in cryostat or on ice. Avoid including white matter as much as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1i4u","text":"Transfer minced tissue into a well of the 6-well plate containing either 1-2 mLs of extraction buffer if doing a small extraction (~600 total mg of minced tissue) or 3+ mLs of extraction buffer if doing a larger extraction (~1000 total mg of minced tissue). Mix ~20 times with 1000µL pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"558gm","text":"Incubate sample on ice for 10 minutes, mixing ~20 times with the pipette about every 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"50n70","text":"Syringe the sample twice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5l67r","text":"If doing a small extraction (1-2 mLs), syringe into the same well of a 6-well tissue culture plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"666rc","text":"If doing a larger extraction (3+ mLs), transfer the syringed tissue+buffer into a new well of a 6-well tissue culture plate each time you pass the sample through a syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b3i6u","text":"Filter through a 20 uM filter, flushing with DB + i (flush the filter with 12.5 mLs DB + i for every mL of extraction buffer used).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4mfl7","text":"Split the volume into multiple 50 mL tubes as needed so that each tube has 12.5 mL of sample. (For a 1 mL extraction, 12.5 mLs will go into 1 tube; for a 4 mLs extraction, a total volume of 50 mLs will go into 4 tubes with 12.5 mLs per tube.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ef6m1","text":"Spin down for 10 minutes at 4ºC - 500 x g for human/primate tissue or 600 x g for mouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a2bdb","text":"Remove and discard supernatants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dkuac","text":"Combine and resuspend the pellets in DB + i. (Use 10 mLs DB + i for a large ~1000 mg extraction.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6t5tl","text":"Count a dilution of the nuclei.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dkguq","text":"For myelin removal, dilute nuclei to 1000 n/µL with 10X cell loading buffer (1% BSA in PBS + 0.2U/uL i).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7difm","text":"Add myelin removal beads (10 uL of beads per mL of nuclei at 1000 N/uL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8li7v","text":"Mix and aliquot nuclei into 1.5 mL tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dl7gq","text":"Incubate nuclei with rotation at 4ºC for 15 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hs90","text":"Briefly spin down the tubes to get liquid off the caps, then place on a magnet at 4ºC for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2sjdu","text":"Transfer nuclei to new tubes, pulling up from the bottom and avoiding the myelin pellet on the side of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"asj9b","text":"Spin down the nuclei at 400 x g at 4ºC for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8qre3","text":"Remove and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1h77l","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 10X cell loading buffer (1% BSA + 0.2 U/uL i).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2901m","text":"Count a dilution of the nuclei.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Village Nuclei Isolation With Myelin Removal
title_html: Village Nuclei Isolation With Myelin Removal

versions.title: Village Nuclei Isolation With Myelin Removal
versions.title_html: Village Nuclei Isolation With Myelin Removal
